entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
